procurement_category: Goods and Services for Buildings and Structures
short_summary: To proceed with the upgrade of the lighting of the Port-Cartier institution
description: Provide electrical products to upgrade the lighting at the Port-Cartier institution. The statement of work includes the specific lightning equipment required. The estimated quantity of commodity is based on the solicitation document statement of work and basis of payment. It is expected that the contract will should be completed by March 31st, 2023
duration_in_months: All the deliverables must be received on or before March 31st 2023.
